name: Dora the Explorer: Pirate Pig's Treasure & Super Star Adventures
name_original: Dora the Explorer: Pirate Pig's Treasure & Super Star Adventures
description: 2 in 1 - Dora the Explorer - Pirate Pig's Treasure & Super Star Adventures is a Adventure/Compilation video game published by Global Star Software released on February 5th, 2007 for the GBA.
